extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • getFpostFeature

        public Matrix getFpostFeature()
        Specified by:
        getFpostFeature in interface IntData
        Returns:
        For each post p_i, f_i in R^m are the set of feature values where f_i(j) is the frequency of f_j used by p_i . F = {f1,f2, . . . ,fNl } in R n x m denotes the whole dataset.

      • getXpostFeature

        public Matrix getXpostFeature()
        Specified by:
        getXpostFeature in interface IntData
        Returns:
        X is the matrix for labelled data. It represents a sub-matrix of F.

      • getYpostCats

        public Matrix getYpostCats()
        Specified by:
        getYpostCats in interface IntData
        Returns:
        Let c = {c_1, c_2, . . . , c_k} denote the class label set where k is the number of classes. Y in R Nl x k is the class label matrix for labelled data where Y(i, j) = 1 if p_i is labelled as c_j , otherwise zero.

      • getSuserUser

        public Matrix getSuserUser()
        Specified by:
        getSuserUser in interface IntData
        Returns:
        S a graph with adjacency matrix, where S(i, j) = 1 if there is a following relationship from u_j to u_i and zero otherwise.

      • getPcoPost

        public Matrix getPcoPost()
        Specified by:
        getPcoPost in interface IntData
        Returns:
        Let P in R n xN denote user-post relationships where P(i, j) = 1 if p_j is posted by u_i, zero otherwise.

      • getH

        public Matrix getH()
        Specified by:
        getH in interface IntData
        Returns:
        Let H in R N x n be an indicator matrix where H(i,j) = 1/|F_j| if u_j is the author of p_i.
